body:
I was just wondering since I love nebula so much if I could make a new map for nebula?

And if I could make a match could I make it a map that u can't break
body_tagged:
I was just wondering since I love nebula so much if I could make a new map for nebula?

And if I could make a match could I make it a map that u can't break
title: Can I make a map for nebula?

replies.body: of course you can.. you don't need any permission. just keep in mind.. unbreakable maps can only be TDM or OITN
replies.body_tagged: of course you can.. you don't need any permission. just keep in mind.. unbreakable maps can only be TDM or OITN

replies.body: ya but where do u make the maps
replies.body_tagged: ya but where do u make the maps

replies.body: In a singleplayer world or a server  :c        i tink
replies.body_tagged: In a singleplayer world or a server  :c        i tink

replies.body:
For singleplayer:
look up on google
1.liteloader
2.worldeditwrapper
3.how to generate a void world using superflat presets.

for multiplayer: add alexanderjoe10 on skype and as for his server ip address+whitelist
replies.body_tagged:
For singleplayer:
look up on google
1.liteloader
2.worldeditwrapper
3.how to generate a void world using superflat presets.

for multiplayer: add alexanderjoe10 on skype and as for his server ip address+whitelist

replies.body: You dont need to download anything for a void world... go into superflat, edit layers, make the numbers and letters in the bar "1x0"
replies.body_tagged: You dont need to download anything for a void world... go into superflat, edit layers, make the numbers and letters in the bar "1x0"

replies.body: any more help would be great
replies.body_tagged: any more help would be great

replies.body:
k, also,
for YAML go to docs.avicus.net
and try to focus on gameplay, not aesthetics.
replies.body_tagged:
